guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"38mdc","text":"Try not to move the camera too much and not tare the grey tape on the floor. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"56itj","text":"OG C1 Camera","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"57uco","text":"SD card (already in the camera)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfiud","text":"USB chord with orange tape","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ra8f","text":"OpenField apparatus","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a59k7","text":"ANY-Maze laptop","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"argp","text":"- Plug the USB cord with orange tape connected to the ceiling camera to the power strip on the ground. This will turn on the camera","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a1qap","text":"- Slowly and carefully move the apparatus to align with the grey tape on the floor","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"llru","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fos4d","text":"PLEASE BE CAREFUL NOT TO TARE THE GREY Set the infrared lights around the apparatus.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gth4","text":"- On the remote, press the infrared button (1)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":42,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0s6t","text":"- Switch off the {"blocks":[{"key":"5ajtr","text":"Protocol Configuration:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8u8nv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2hqk","text":"- Navigate to the \"Protocol\" tab.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"251ca","text":"- Under \"Video source,\" choose \"OG1 Camera\" and select your video file to use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6080t","text":"- Apparatus Setup:  Define zone limits for each box:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50t37","text":"           o Disabled unused chamber (if testing fewer animals).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2t62p","text":"           o Adjust orange rectangles for exterior and center zones. The center zone must always be 40% of the total area.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4orfe","text":"           o Also adjust the green ruler to match the apparatus side.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6u4mg","text":"- Behavior Setup: Move to “Zones” and verify that the correct zones are highlighted in blue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e67ou","text":"Experiment Configuration:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crptr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"390ds","text":"- Move to the \"Experiment\" tab.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"an1fg","text":"- Specify an experiment title.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6a3lc","text":"- Add treatments with the corresponding number of animals (example: nicotine A, vehicle B)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7trlr","text":"- in the “View animals” tab, assign treatment to each animal (example = A for nicotine).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3hpi1","text":"Test Execution:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mbbn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fcnkc","text":"- Proceed to the \"Test\" tab.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a72jk","text":"- Ensure everything is set correctly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8u98h","text":"- Click \"Rewind and start the video at a test start\" while pressing the start button.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gu5j","text":"- If the initial start doesn't work correctly, click \"Stop,\" scroll down to the start button, and select \"Start the video at a test start\" twice to begin when desired.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":139,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a7apq","text":"- If issues arise, the experiment can be restarted by canceling in the left window.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ecsio","text":"- After completing one animal, load another video and repeat.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1du27","text":"Results Analysis:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40m0b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54s2e","text":"- Go to the \"Result\" tab.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"86stk","text":"- Choose desired results, configure “Data Grouping”, adjust “Report Format,” and track plot.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0qkt","text":"- View Plots.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5u17i","text":"- Save what you want to save : protocol, text, track plot, ...","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Mouse OpenField + ANY-Maze Protocol
